articles.description: Researchers found that eating about five servings of fruits and vegetables was associated with the lower risk of death.
articles.content: A major study on nearly 2 million adults worldwide confirms what nutrition experts have been suggesting for decades: Eat your fruits and vegetables. Best of all? It actually doesn't take much to get … [+2369 chars]

articles.title: Hair Loss Is A Hot Topic: Is COVID Responsible? : Goats and Soda - NPR
articles.description: The term "hair loss" has been googled a lot during this pandemic. What's going on?
articles.content: Genevieve Villamora, 44, says she suffered hair loss after recovering from COVID-19: Her hands would be covered with hair after a shower. It was "traumatic because as a woman so much of my femininity… [+5394 chars]
